akn:section.akn:heading: Major weapon systems: assessment, management, and control of operating and support costs

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Defense shall issue and maintain guidance on actions to be taken to assess, manage, and control Department of Defense costs for the operation and support of major weapon systems.
(b) The guidance required by subsection (a) shall, at a minimum—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Retention of Data on Operating and Support Costs.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) In this section, the term “major weapon system” has the meaning given that term in section 3455(f) of this title.
